rukus.text: 84|1|On goh ki osmon sikofta savad
84|2|Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
84|3|Va on goh ki zamin gusturda [va hamvor] savad
84|4|Va har ciro daruni xud dorad, ʙerun rezad va tihi gardad
84|5|Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
84|6|Ej inson, ʙe gumon, tu dar rohi [rasidan ʙa] Parvardigorat saxt talosu kusis mekuni; pas, Uro muloqot xohi kard
84|7|Va ammo kase, ki noma [-i a'molas] ʙa dasti rostas doda savad
84|8|Ba zudi ʙa hisoʙe oson muhosiʙa mesavad
84|9|Va sodmon ʙa suji xonavodaas ʙozmegardad
84|10|Va ammo kase, ki nomai [a'molas] az pusti saras ʙa u doda savad
84|11|Pas, haloki xudro xohad talaʙid
84|12|Va ʙa [otasi] cahannami su'lavar xohad daromad
84|13|Be gumon, u dar [dunjo ʙa xotiri gunohonas] mijoni xonavodai xud sodmon ʙud
84|14|U gumon mekard, ki hargiz [ʙa nazdi Alloh taolo] ʙoznaxohad gast
84|15|Ore, hamono Parvardigoras az holi vaj ogoh ʙud
84|16|Pas, ʙa safaq savgand mexuram
84|17|Va savgand ʙa saʙ va on ciro furu mepusad
84|18|Va savgand ʙa moh cun [furuƣas] komil savad
84|19|Hatman, marotiʙu holoti muxtalifero jake pas az digare [dar masiri zindagii dunjavi] taj xohed kard
84|20|Pas, ononro ci suda, ki imon nameovarand
84|21|Va [caro] hangome ki Qur'on ʙar onon tilovat savad, sacda namekunand
84|22|Balki kasone, ki kofir sudand, pajvasta [ojoti ilohiro] takziʙ mekunand
84|23|Va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci dar dil pinhon medorand, donotar ast
84|24|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro ʙa azoʙi dardnoke ʙasorat deh
84|25|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, ki ʙaroi onon podose ʙeminnat va pajvasta ast
